FuncDef:
The tcp ipv6 timer fin-timeout command sets a TCP6 FIN-Wait timer value.
The undo tcp ipv6 timer fin-timeout command restores the default value. The tcp ipv6 timer fin-timeout command sets a TCP6 FIN-Wait timer value. The undo tcp ipv6 timer fin-timeout command restores the default value. By default, the TCP6 FIN-Wait timer value is 675 seconds. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a TCP6 FIN-Wait timer value.
The value is an integer ranging from 76 to 3600, in seconds.

ExtraInfo: When the TCP6 connection status changes from FIN_WAIT_1 to FIN_WAIT_2, the FIN-Wait timer is enabled. If no FIN packet is received before the timeout of FIN-Wait timer, the TCP6 connection is terminated.
